ocid.description: A globally unique identifier for this Contracting Process

id.description: An identifier for this particular release of information for CP

date.description: The date this information is released

tag.description: A value from the releaseTag codelist that identifies the nature of the release being made

initiationType.description: String specifying the type of initiation process used for this contract, taken from the initiationType codelist

planning.rationale.description: The rationale for the procurement provided in free text.

planning.budget.description.description: A short free text description of the budget source

planning.budget.amount.description: Object described the sum of funds specified by CA this CP.

planning.budget.isEuropeanUnionFunded.description: True/False field to indicate whether this procurement is related to a project and/or programme financed by EU

planning.budget.budget Breakdown.description: Detailed budget breakdown to be expressed, covering multiple budget sources and multiple periods

tender.classification.description: The primary classification for the tender. Uses CPV Codelist

tender.status.description: The current status of the CP based on the tenderStatus codelist

tender.statusDetails.description: The current status of the CP based on the tenderStatusDetails codelist

tender.value.description: The total upper estimated value of this CP

tender.procurementMethod.description: Specify tendering method against the procurementMethods codelist

tender.procurementMethodDetails.description: Additional detail on the procurement method used.

tender.procurementMethodAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information about the procurement method

tender.mainProcurementCategory.description: The primary category describing the object of this contracting process from the procurementCategory codelist

tender.additionalProcurementCategories.description: Additional categories which describe the subject of this CP, from the extendedProcurementCategory codelist

tender.hasEnquiries.description: A true/false field to indicate whether any enquiries were received during the tender process

tender.eligibilityCriteria.description: A description of any eligibility criteria for potential suppliers.

tender.submissionLanguages.description: Language(s) in which tenderers may submit, drawn from the submissionLanguages codelist

tender.contractPeriod.description: The period over which the contract is estimated or required to be active

tender.acceleratedProcedure.isAccelerate.description: A True/False field to indicate whether an accelerated procedure has been used for this procurement

tender.designContest.serviceContractAwar.description: A True/False field to indicate whether a service contract will be awarded to the winner(s) of the design contest.
